title: Increased deficit spending decreases bond prices

content.question: Assume that the government finances its spending by borrowing from the public. If the government increases deficit spending, the price of previously issued bonds and the real interest rate will change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Price of Bonds Real Interest Rate Decrease Decrease
Price of Bonds Real Interest Rate Decrease Increase
Price of Bonds Real Interest Rate Increase Decrease
Price of Bonds Real Interest Rate Increase No change
Price of Bonds Real Interest Rate Increase Increase

content.answer: Price of Bonds Real Interest Rate Decrease Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
